basics.name: Ouassil Dahimene
basics.label: Full-Stack Data Professional
basics.summary: Data Analyst with expertise in fraud detection, data analysis, and software development. Experienced in collecting and analyzing large datasets, automating data preprocessing, and producing actionable reports. Skills in Teradata, Apache Spark, PySpark, Hive, Python, SQL, and Django.

work.name: Djezzy
work.summary: Analyzing telecom data to detect fraud patterns, prevent revenue leakage, and ensure compliance. Building automated workflows, dashboards, and reports to strengthen fraud prevention and support business decision-making.
highlights: Reduced SMS fraud cases by designing automated detection rules and alerting workflows.
Improved efficiency of fraud reporting by automating monthly analysis using Python and SQL.
Integrated multiple data sources (CDRs, SMS logs, blocking lists) into fraud monitoring systems.
responsibilities: Monitored and analyzed SMS, voice, and data traffic to identify fraudulent activity such as bulk SMS abuse and SIMBox usage.
Designed and maintained automated data pipelines using Python, SQL, and big data tools (Hive, PySpark, DuckDB).
Created dashboards and fraud reports for management and regulators to support decision-making.
Collaborated with fraud, IT, and operations teams to implement rules, alerts, and prevention measures.
Investigated suspicious MSISDNs and coordinated with operations to block fraudulent activity.
achievements: Developed automated fraud detection processes that improved fraud response time.
Delivered comprehensive fraud analysis reports that enhanced transparency and compliance.
Optimized fraud monitoring coverage by combining telecom data sources into unified views.

work.name: SIG Service
work.summary: Assisting in the development and maintenance of software applications using Python and Django. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure quality and timely delivery of software solutions.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django.
Worked closely with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Participated in daily stand-ups and bi-weekly sprint planning meetings to ensure alignment with project goals.
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.

work.name: ELCS RESEARCH
work.summary: Assisted in developing client websites and applications. Gained hands-on experience with front-end and back-end technologies.
responsibilities: Collaborated with senior developers to design and implement web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks.
Assisted in debugging and optimizing front-end code to ensure smooth user experiences.
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving coding standards within the team.
achievements: Developing and maintaining web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.

volunteer.summary: Helped organize coding workshops and mentored new members.
